alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 20 at 3:30AM PST until December 20 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch south of Mt Adams. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Washington Cascades. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Washington Cascades
